name: Chris's Game Collection (2004)
description:
[Flashing Light Warning]

From the mind of a 12 year old comes a small collection of what could arguably be called games and animations.

This pack comes directly from a CD I put together in Elementary School with some of my earliest forays into game design as well as a couple bonus gif animations and a particularly goofy copyright threat message.

Games:

- My Little Pony Battle:  A parody one on one battle game where each player needs to shoot and dodge arrows.

- When Hobos Attack:  As what may be one of the world's first walking simulators, you play as a bottle-tossing homeless man travelling through your city.

- SANTA: A remix of When Hobos Attack where you must deliver presents to the patrons of Earth with force!

- Sonic Tag: A chasing one on one game where you can make your own fun playing tag back and forth.

- Shoot the targets beta: This is honestly barely a game. You move around and shoot the guys. If you get hit, you die and have to restart. Lol.

Animations:

Some simple MS Paint gif animations I made when I thought stick fighting animations were cool.

- Animation1.gif: aka When Bond Meets Barbie

- 1-60.gif: aka James Bond Jetpack

Final Words:

To be real with you, I don't expect anyone to necessarily describe their experience with these games to be "having fun"! They are an amateur but important part of my history as a game designer and programmer and it's fun to look back on where it all began.
